how_to_use: After cleansing and serum application, apply a generous amount to the face and neck, gently massaging in an upward motion until fully absorbed.
name: NUUHA BEAUTY 7X PEPTIDE ULTIMATE GLASS SKIN MOISTURISER

result.recommendation: This moisturizer will enhance skin hydration and improve overall texture, leaving skin feeling soft and supple.
